reference.shortdesc: The line-through element indicates text that is rendered with a line struck through the content. This element is designed to enable authors to indicate a deletion or revision for rhetorical purpose; it is not intended to be used for indicating revisions.

section.title: Formatting expectations
section.p: Although rendering is left up to implementations, processors typically apply render the contents of the line-through element with a line struck through..
